dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Stored Blood​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
At Turn End, depending on the [KeptBlood] value on self:
- At a value lesser than or equal to 5 [KeptBlood], gain 1 [Binding], 1 [Vulnerable], and 1 [AttackDown] next turn for every [KeptBlood] lost
- At a value greater than 5 [KeptBlood], gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] for every excess value

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Must Retain Blood​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Gains a new pattern when [KeptBlood] reaches 0 for the first time
Fix this unit's speed to 10 when using the Skill 'I Am... The Prince... of the Parade...!'

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>The Prince's Frenzy​</line-height>
dataList.desc: When this unit reaches 30% HP, gain [BloodyCrave]

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Hardblood Glaive​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the highest sum of [Laceration] Potency and Count
On Hit, if the target has [Laceration], heal 2% HP

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Sanguivore - Coagulation​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When this unit has [Laceration]:
- Gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up for every 5 [Laceration] (max 10)
- Gain 1 Clash Power Up for every 10 [Laceration] (max 5)
- Take 50% less damage from [Laceration] (rounded down)

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood Coagulation​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Gain +1 [Laceration] Count every time this unit is hit
Turn End: consume 3 [Laceration] Count on self to gain 1 [HardenedBlood]

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Thirst for Blood​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [Laceration]
Turn End: if this unit failed to deal any damage this turn, gain 2 [Vulnerable] and 2 [AttackUp] next turn

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Bloodsucking​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Take 10% less damage from [Laceration] (rounded down)
On Hit, if the target has [Laceration], heal 10% of the damage dealt

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Rough Bloodsucking​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Take 20% less damage from [Laceration] (rounded down)
On Hit, if the target has [Laceration], heal 15% of the damage dealt

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Power Leakage​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
When hit, if the attacker used a Skill that gains [Charge], the attacker steals 1 [Charge] Count from this unit.
(Once per Skill. Does not activate if this unit does not have [Charge])

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Blood to Brain​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Take 30% less damage from [Laceration] (rounded down)
On Hit, if the target has [Laceration], heal 15% of the damage dealt

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Prosthesis Model - L37​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: At less than 5 [Charge] Count, gain 1 [Reduction]
Turn Start: At 5+ [Charge] Count, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp]

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>A Young Kindred​</line-height>
dataList.desc:
Take 30% less damage from [Laceration] (rounded down)
On Hit, if the target has [Laceration], heal 25% of the damage dealt

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Tenacious​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Self-inflicted damage due to this unit's Skills does not reduce this unit's HP under 1

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>Burst Bloodbag​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Combat Start: starts the Encounter only with half of max HP

dataList.name: <line-height=120%>The Seventh Kindred​</line-height>
dataList.desc: Gain +1 Slot for every ally at 1 HP (2 times max)
